channel.title: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?
channel.description:
As you know when a player log in there ip is, 127.0.0.1, So of course my ip ban command will not work correctly since its only going to ban the 127.0.0.1 ip and thats useless, so is there anyway to make my players ip show up in game when logging in, this will save me alot of time with the abusing people who just creat a new char since they can never be ip banned. Thanks for looking.
/William

item.title: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

Why not just add a working ping request and add it to the client to send the correct ip and have it save to the players file. Then you can get the ip of all players without having to type out commands as if there was more than one person who needed ip banning, doing a command for each player would take a long time. By doing this you could also add a new option into the gui to ip ban when you select the players name.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?

item.title: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Lets PK, post:5, topic:328612”][quote author=yong min link=topic=425011.msg3121271#msg3121271 date=1265550349]
Add it to the command handler and execute it as:

::getip <username>

It will basically just send a message with the player’s current IP.
[/quote]
Thanks once again Mr lee :)[/quote]

hahaha Yo Lee ^^

Read full topic

item.title: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:2, topic:328612”]Get it by command using the getCurrentIP method.

if(cmd.equals("getip")) { Player target = world.getPlayer(args[0]); if(target != null) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage(target.getUsername() + "'s IP is: " + target.getCurrentIP); } } [/quote]
Thanks Yong your a star as always :), Is it as simple as adding that to my command handler or abit more tricky?

Thanks for your reply

Read full topic
item.source: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?

item.title: How to get ip's from EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Get it by command using the getCurrentIP method.

if(cmd.equals("getip")) {
Player target = world.getPlayer(args[0]);
if(target != null) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(target.getUsername() + "'s IP is: " + target.getCurrentIP);
}
}

Read full topic
